algorithm_technique: Find next lexicographical permutation of the first half and reconstruct palindrome
problem_summary_simple: Find the smallest palindrome larger than a given palindrome using its digits.
problem_summary_technical: Apply the next lexicographical permutation algorithm to the first half of the palindrome string and reconstruct the full palindrome.
key_insights: A palindrome is determined by its first half. Finding the next palindrome means finding the next lexicographically greater first half.
The standard next permutation algorithm can be applied to the first half of the palindrome.
If the first half cannot be rearranged to a lexicographically larger permutation, no larger palindrome exists.
